issue.title: [C++] Bug: Build fails on windows with "-DARROW_BUILD_BENCHMARKS=ON"
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1909](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1909). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It appears to be an issue with building google/benchmark.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1909?focusedCommentId=16312346) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 1406
